name: BrickLink Exported Cart
summary: A CART file is a list of shopping cart contents exported from BrickLink, an online LEGO marketplace. It contains a list of stores from which a user planned to buy LEGO elements and a list of the lots and items the user planned to buy from those stores. BrickLink users can import CART files to add the files' contents to their shopping cart.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
